document.heading: District of Columbia Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-218, the “District of Columbia Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-334, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 29, 1988 and December 13, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 6, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 7-293 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
